00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_LOCATION_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_LOCATION_H_
00032 #include <string>
00033 #include <ostream>
00034 
00035 //#include "oscit/thash.h"
00036 typedef unsigned int uint;
00037 
00038 namespace mdns {
00039 
00040 #define DEFAULT_PROTOCOL "lubyk"
00041 
00042 class ZeroConfBrowser;
00043 
00050 class Location
00051 {
00052 public:
00055   static const unsigned long NO_IP = 0;
00058   static const unsigned long ANY_IP = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00059   static const unsigned long LOOPBACK = (127<<24) + 1; // 127.0.0.1
00060   static const uint NO_PORT = 0;
00061   static const uint DEFAULT_INTERFACE = 0;
00062 
00063   Location(const char *protocol,
00064            const char *service_name,
00065            const char *hostname,
00066            uint port = NO_PORT,
00067            uint interface = DEFAULT_INTERFACE)
00068       : protocol_(protocol),
00069         name_(service_name),
00070         host_(hostname),
00071         ip_(ip_from_hostname(hostname)),
00072         port_(port),
00073         interface_(interface) {}
00074 
00075   Location(const char *protocol,
00076            const char *hostname,
00077            uint port)
00078       : protocol_(protocol),
00079         host_(hostname),
00080         ip_(ip_from_hostname(hostname)),
00081         port_(port) {}
00082 
00083   Location(const char *protocol,
00084            unsigned long ip,
00085            uint port)
00086       : protocol_(protocol),
00087         host_(name_from_ip(ip_)),
00088         ip_(ip),
00089         port_(port) {}
00090 
00091   Location(const char *protocol,
00092            const char *service_name)
00093       : protocol_(protocol),
00094         name_(service_name),
00095         ip_(NO_IP),
00096         port_(NO_PORT) {}
00097 
00098   Location()
00099       : ip_(NO_IP),
00100         port_(NO_PORT) {}
00101 
00102   void clear() {
00103     protocol_ = "";
00104     name_ = "";
00105     host_ = "";
00106     ip_   = NO_IP;
00107     port_ = NO_PORT;
00108   }
00109 
00110   bool operator!=(const Location &other) const {
00111     return !(this->operator==(other));
00112   }
00113 
00114   bool operator==(const Location &other) const {
00115     return protocol_ == other.protocol_ &&
00116            (
00117              (ip_ != Location::NO_IP && ip_ == other.ip_ && port_ == other.port_) ||
00118              (host_ == other.host_ && port_ == other.port_)
00119            );
00120   }
00121 
00122   const char *protocol() const {
00123     return protocol_.c_str();
00124   }
00125 
00126   const char *name() const {
00127     return name_.c_str();
00128   }
00129 
00130   const char *host() const {
00131     return host_.c_str();
00132   }
00133 
00134   const unsigned long &ip() const {
00135     return ip_;
00136   }
00137 
00138   const uint &port() const {
00139     return port_;
00140   }
00141 
00142   const uint &interface() const {
00143     return interface_;
00144   }
00145 
00146   void set_port(uint port) {
00147     port_ = port;
00148   }
00149 
00152   const std::string inspect() const;
00153 
00154   static unsigned long ip_from_hostname(const char *hostname);
00155   static const std::string name_from_ip(unsigned long ip);
00156 
00157 private:
00158   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out_stream, const Location &location);
00159   friend class Url;
00160   friend uint hashId(const Location &location);
00161 
00162 
00165   std::string protocol_;
00166 
00169   std::string name_;
00170 
00173   std::string host_;
00174 
00177   unsigned long ip_;
00178 
00181   uint port_;
00182 
00185   uint interface_;
00186 };
00187 
00188 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out_stream, const Location &location);

00190 } // mdns
